definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: The sky light thin mist, cricket that month.
sentences.chinese: 天边浅淡薄雾起，蛐蛐叫月。

sentences.english: The horizon beyond is of the deepest ultramarine .
sentences.chinese: 远处的天边，则是一片最深的群青。

sentences.english: Seeing the rise of the bright sun on the horizon, I know that a new day has begun.
sentences.chinese: 看到天边曈曈红日的升起，我知道新的一天又开始了。

sentences.english: The red glow is a natural glow of a nearby town.
sentences.chinese: 小镇天边露出的红光是那么的自然。

sentences.english: A white sail moves along the horizon .
sentences.chinese: 一片白帆沿着天边移动。

sentences.english: Crisscrossing the skyline are streams of unending repulsorlift traffic.
sentences.chinese: 在天边来往交错的是无尽的反重力交通流。

sentences.english: Wandering the wind blowing from afar, the empty horizon.
sentences.chinese: 漂泊的风从远方吹来，空寂的天边。

sentences.english: The road seems to go on forever into the far horizon.
sentences.chinese: 这条路似乎永不到头，一直通向天边。

sentences.english: A red sky evening indicingesteds fine weather the following day.
sentences.chinese: 晚上天边有红云就表示次日天气会很晴朗。

sentences.english: A white sail moves along the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 一片白帆沿着天边移动。

sentences.english: Open widely rich think to want to go, until beyond the horizon deliver white, didn't also fall comatose.
sentences.chinese: 张大富思来想去，直到天边发白，也没有睡着。

sentences.english: You like the raindrop falling from the fringe of sky.
sentences.chinese: 你们像雨点一般从天边落下。

sentences.english: These trees can almost touch the sky.
sentences.chinese: 这些树木几乎快高到天边了。

sentences.english: Look at the moon in the high sky waiting for invitation for dance.
sentences.chinese: 月乐高挂在天边，邀月何时舞音符。

sentences.english: All that remains is the boundless Yangtze River, flowing on towards heaven.
sentences.chinese: 眼前只剩茫茫的长江水，奔流天边。

sentences.english: Remnants of clouds cling to the horizon like fluffs of cotton wool.
sentences.chinese: 天边留连着几朵残云，看起来象蓬松的棉絮。

definition: multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
the sun sets in the west (idiom)
white (paint from dried fish guts)/marble white color of the dawn sky
